Svailorn

The Svailorn are a race of tall, fey humanoids native to Naltera's moon, Lufia. They are approximately 50% taller than Humans, slight, and pale-skinned, resembling the Elfin to whom they are related.

Culture

Svailorn cities are as mighty and glorious as those of the Elfin in The Feywild. No attention to detail is spared, and vast quantities of moon_dust and fine fabrics are gathered together to maintain their aesthetic. Even Svailorn dwelling in jungles and forests ensure that though their settlements may be difficult to find, they will inspire awe upon arrival: they are towering, layered castles of intricately carved and woven wood, draped in animal skins and fabrics as fine as those made in the cities, lit by innumerable lanterns shaded by coloured papers.

Stars

Stars hold a great significance in Svailorn culture, being only visible from certain parts of Lufia, and only under certain circumstances. In the settlements about The Moonsea grand festivals are held at times when the skies ordinarily clear about the southside, revealing the stars, which reflect clearly in the waters. In the jungle or forest territories towering observatories are constructed to reach above the canopies, where the stars might be glimpsed. From the borders of White Desert, sometimes pilgrimages are made to its inner reaches, where the stars are always visible at night. Some of the 'monuments' there, formed of meteors surviving their impacts into the soft sand, are revered as fallen stars.

Size

Despite their height, Svailorn are Medium creatures and thus recieve no bonuses or penalties due to their size.

Type

Fey/Humanoid

Base Speed

Svailorn have a base speed of 30 feet.

Vision

Svailorn are accustomed to longer periods of twilight than most, and have low-light vision.

Racial Traits

Ability Score Racial Traits

Svailorn have a regal but genial air and are quick to make friends. They are studious and have a great interest in all kinds of lore. Being accustomed to weaker gravity than most, their bodies are weak for their size.

  • -2 Strength
  • +2 Intelligence
  • +2 Charisma

Silver Tongue

The culture and native tongue of the Svailorn is well suited to diplomatic and amiable discourse, and this carries through to their understanding of other languages. They gain a +2 bonus to Diplomacy and Charm checks, to other mental checks relating to friendly negotiation, and to Linguistics or Sense Motive checks to deal with creatures speaking an unknown language.

Svailorn Reach

When wielding weapons designed for a Svailorn, not including unarmed strikes, knuckle dusters, cestus, daggers, or similar small weapons, Svailorn gain +5ft reach because of their elongated form.

Elven Immunities

Svailorn are immune to magic sleep effects and gain a +2 racial saving throw bonus against enchantment spells and effects.

Elven Magic

Svailorn recieve a +2 racial bonus on caster level checks made to overcome spell resistance. In addition, Svailorn recieve a +2 racial bonus on Spellcraft skill checks made to identify properties of magic items.
